name: Party Ball
description:
For more Party Ball fun, be sure to check out the sequel, Party Ball Arcade on Android.

It's a rolling good time as you collect cola for the big party! Roll your beach ball through beaches, forests and more on your way to fun. Party Ball is a maze/puzzle game with simple controls but addictive game play and fun levels to navigate ranging from seashores and forests to city areas and beyond. Hazards including falling into the ocean, burning up in a wild fire and getting run over by speeding cars. Getting to the end of each level in one piece is an enchantingly rewarding experience that everyone will enjoy.
